@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi You are a failure #TrumpGate has 87K deaths 36 million unemployed largest national debt ever! This would not have happen if you had took action instead of calling the Coronavirus a hoax.
#TrumpIsACompleteFailure 
#TrumpDeathToll85K 
#TrumpIsAnIdiot 
#TrumpVirusCatastrophe https://t.co/JAbn5fxGhi
